text:
A few days ago I successfully linked my local dev tool (VS code) to a sandbox account and was able to push some stuff up to it. I am working on it again today and am unclear how to continue to do this. It does not appear to be linked currently (I tried using the hs create command and it errored). When I used npx hs init it also errored and said "Programming\HubSpot\HubSpot.config.yml already exists"

I'm not sure quite how to ask/say this, but how do I start it up again?
to clarify, it's not recognizing any of the hs commands whatsoever.
